import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "../../assets/css/home.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faArrowLeft, faArrowRight, faMessage, } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.3/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"; import image from "../../assets/images/image.png"; import { Navbar, Footer } from "./../index"; import axios from "axios"; const Home = () => { const [dataBlog, setDataBlog] = useState([]); let indexFirstCategories = []; let date = new Date(); useEffect(async () => { await axios .get("http://localhost:3006/blogs") .then((res) => { setDataBlog(res.data.data); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, []); const getFullDate = (fullDate) => { let getMonth = fullDate.getMonth() + 1; if (getMonth < 10) { getMonth = "0" + getMonth; } return fullDate.getFullYear() + "-" + getMonth + "-" + fullDate.getDate(); }; return ( <>
